description: Erection of two storey side extension
decision_conditions: Due to the inadequate separation distance at first floor level and proximity to the shared boundary with No. 8 Orme Road the proposed development would erode the characteristic gaps between semi-detached properties on the street and potentially lead to a terracing effect.  It would also unbalance the symmetry between the application site and No. 12 orme Road, thereby resulting in an adverse impact upon the character and appearance of the area, contrary to policies CS8 and DM10 of the Core Strategy (2012), policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and paragraph 127 of the NPPF (2019).

Details required for Condition 5 (Construction Management Plan) of Planning Permission ref: 23/01707/FUL (Demolition of existing building and outbuilding, and erection of a new four storey building housing a mix of 7 dwellings with associated refuse and cycle provision.)RBK Highways have reviewed the documents as submitted for the discharge of condition 5 of 23/01707/FUL. RBK Highways have no objections to the discharge of condition 5.

Existing Roof Plan - Please provide the Existing Roof Plan at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing the outline of the entire property not just part. The plans must show the direction of North. A scale bar is encouraged.Note: you had removed the Existing Roof Plan from your previous plans (and changed it the First Floor Plan), so please re-submit this.
